dialogs.content: Did you see a roaming soldier on your way here?
I just caught an alert that signals abnormal energy fluctuations at the embankment. Tacet Discords might appear anytime.
Godo was supposed to be manning the watch tower on the other side, but he's nowhere to be found.
Can you do me a favor and take his place for now?

As the sun beats down and the ocean breeze lulls you, your eyes can't help but be drawn to the massive shadow looming over the beach. It beckons to you, calling for your attention and submission—Those man-made, sinister shadows will dance for you. You need only waive the scepter in your hand.
"Yes, you remember what those shadows looked like. The memories are crystal clear. They flow in and out of your mind like waves, yet they leave you with nothing to keep."

"Yes… like waves. Time and tears swirl together in an eternal dance. I admit, you know everything about the past and future. Yet here you are, shipwrecked in this era, stumbling like a newborn. Welcome to this era, Rover, as you awaken again… that's my warm greeting for you."
Heed my advice: Don't touch the truth yet. This is for your own good.
Are you ready to Overdash?
For the Overdash Challenge!
I'm Shui, an honorary member of the Overdash Club.
I wish you'd put it a bit more tactfully...
Actions speak louder than words. Let's get you Overdashing right away to feel the thrill!
Just to confirm, you're here because of our ad, right?
That's right.
It's no surprise you're drawn to such an exciting event.
Don't worry! It's completely legit!
Hold on. Let me show you the official documents from the Ministry of Development.
Don't worry! It's completely legit!
Hold on. Let me show you the official documents from the Ministry of Development.
Fantastic! By the way, let me show you the official documents from the Ministry of Development. We've got the green light!
They're gone...
The documents... are gone!!
A-Anyway, trust me! We've got all the permits!
As long as we stick to the designated area, we are good to go.
So, here's a trick instead. Pay attention, and stay safe, okay?
Step 1: Assess your surroundings. Step 2: Get your hook ready. Step 3: Warm up. Step 4: Let's go! Always keep an eye out for the next Grapple Point.
If you can't spot it, use your Glider for a better view. And remember, don't retract it mid-air or you'll fall straight down!
Even though it's a race, safety is priority number one. Got it?
It's normal to feel dizzy at first. I've got some antiemetics just in case. Hopefully, you won't need them...
Fantastic! Love your enthusiasm!
Alright, get ready for your first Overdash! Meet me at the outskirts. Don't stand me up!
Ready for what?
Got it.
Just enjoy my performance.
Alright, here we are at the starting line. Feeling those butterflies fluttering?
Haha, every time I'm about to kick off an Overdash challenge, those nerves hit me like a wave!
Excellent! Can't wait to see what you've got!
Ahem, it's not the point!
Once you hit that track and leap forward into the air, all this jitter will vanish, replaced by pure exhilaration.
The wind whipping against your skin, the scenery blurring past you... It's like the entire world fades away, and it's just you out there.
Alright, enough talk. If I keep going, I might just jump into the challenge myself!
Go on! Overdash your way to that finish line! You've got this!
Yes.
Raring to go.
Have you found your permit?
If you haven't been practicing in secret, you must be an Overdash genius!
You are...
Yes.
No.
I came for the rewards.
Is it safe?
Come on, follow me! Let's have a friendly race on the next track, shall we?
Hey, look! I've even managed to find the permits from the Ministry of Development.
But it says "Not Approved"...
What?!
Oh my...
It really does.
Darn it! I thought it was just a formality. Didn't expect them to throw so many hurdles our way!
Yeah, I know. I admit I did overlook those issues...
But it's still frustrating, you know?
Guess I'll have to rewrite the entire application from scratch. My head throbs just thinking about it.
How about you write it for me?
I'm afraid...
Sure.
Only if you pay me.
Oh my!
Oh, how I wish applications could write themselves!
Just kidding!
I appreciate your honesty, but no worries. I'll handle my own affairs.
I'll just do it myself.
It seems I'll have to shut down the <color=#fef676>Overdash Club</color> for now. I'll get the members to work on track designs and maintenance during this downtime.
And you can use this opportunity to practice even harder!
When I've sorted out all the issues, I'll extend another invitation to you!
By then, you'll see <color=#fef676>brand-new equipment and track designs!</color>
Oh well...
Guess I'll have to rewrite the entire application from scratch. My head throbs just thinking about it.
How about you write it for me?
Oh my!
Oh, how I wish applications could write themselves!
Just kidding!
I appreciate your kindness, but no worries. I'll handle my own affairs.
I guess the Fellowship will have to shut down for a while, squatting to do some design and maintenance work at home.
You just take this opportunity to work out.
Once we've worked out our troubles, the Overdash Fellowship will once again extend an invitation to challenge you.
At that point, the new equipment and Overdash track design will make a handsome appearance!
